Competitive landscape of IPTV SKY ITALIA

IPTV SKY ITALIA ranks 1,519 th among 1519 competitors which include MobiTV, YuppTV and Zapping. 6 of its competitors are funded while 9 have exited. There is 1 public and 8 acquired companies in the entire competition set.
